rows.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
When the earth is rocked with a terrible quake
and man says, ‘What is the matter with her?’
On that day she will relate her chronicles
for her Lord will have inspired her.

rows.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
rows.translation: On that day, mankind will issue forth in various groups to be shown their deeds.
rows.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

rows.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it,
rows.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
rows.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
